title: For 'Charlie Hebdo,' A History Defined By Humor, Controversy â€” And Cartoons
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to NPR's David Folkenflik about the provocative editorial stance adopted by the French satirical magazine, which was attacked by gunmen this morning in Paris.
